title: Truchard Vineyards Tasting
description:
Join us on February 5th for an exclusive Truchard Estate Wine Tasting at Whispering Vine South Creek! For just $25, indulge in a curated selection of exceptional wines from Truchard Vineyards, known for their rich character and elegance.

Featured Wines:

  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Bold and fruit-forward with blackberry, chocolate, and a creamy texture. (92 James Suckling, 92 Wine Enthusiast)
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Zinfandel 2021 – Exotic and jammy with notes of boysenberry, cranberry, and sweet vanilla.
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Pinot Noir 2022 – Vibrant with cranberry, pomegranate, and warming spices. (93 Wine Enthusiast)
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Merlot 2020 – Lush with wild blueberry, ripe cherry, and a smooth, elegant finish.


💡 Special Offer: Buy a bottle from the tasting and your tasting is FREE!

Don't miss this chance to explore Truchard's outstanding wines at an incredible value. See you there! 🍷✨
